forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
